comment: A modelling construct to provide a root class for containment of DC as well as AC equipment. The class differ from the EquipmentContaner for AC in that it may also contain DCNode-s. Hence it can contain both AC and DC equipment.
description: Adapted from CIM and https://github.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/ data models

contents.name: DCNodes
contents.comment: The DC nodes contained in the DC equipment container.
